name: THE AMERICAN SIDE - theatrical release of neo-noir mystery
blurb: A revolutionary design by Nikola Tesla surfaces in Buffalo, NY, sending a Polish detective on a frantic chase to the brink of Niagara.

name: Revive The Castle Cinema!
blurb: Fifty years ago The Castle Cinema in Hackney welcomed its last guests… Let’s give this old picture palace a new lease of life!

name: Bio Capitol Stockholm
blurb: Hjälp oss att bygga Stockholms skönaste biograf på Sankt Eriksplan med bistro och servering.

name: Save Movie Madness
blurb: Help the Hollywood Theatre save legendary Portland video store Movie Madness and its world-class collection of 80,000+ titles.

name: UNIVERSITY MALL THEATRES "Save Our Butts!"
blurb: If you help put in new seats you'll...SAVE OUR BUTTS!!!

name: THE CLUE : 1ère série fiction Swiss made dont tu es le héros
blurb: Une série qui te plongera dans une intrigue haletante, librement inspirée des 10 Petits Nègres et du Cluedo. Prêt à écrire l'histoire ?

name: JUNK SPACE BERLIN - Feature Film
blurb: Welcome to the marginal deviation of reality / Willkommen in der marginalen Abweichung der Wirklichkeit
